Sept. 16, 1978 D Dronfield Contest (Open Section)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Open Section) 400 Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-open-section
None
Les Preludes [unknown composer]
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £130 and trophy, 2nd £60, 3rd £30. 20th annual contest. 3 bands competed.
Sept. 11, 2013, 10:07 p.m. March 30, 2017, 6:19 a.m.
1 Bestwood Welfare Black Diamonds Band Bernard Wilson
2 Rockingham Band Gordon Pulleyn
3 Calverton Colliery Welfare Bernard Wilson
Withdrawn Barnsley Brass Raymond Elderton
Withdrawn Polypipe Rossington Band A. Titmarsh
